description: Robbie & Massimo are more like buddies than co-workers, seeing who can prank the other one the best. But today Massimo takes the game to a whole new level, conveniently ‘forgetting’ to tell a rain-soaked Robbie about his canceled meeting and giving him a dry suit to change into. But first Robbie must strip… and this is where things get interesting for Massimo. When he sneaks a peek at his tasty, young colleague getting butt naked. Jackpot! Just like that Massimo wins the game and takes the prize - to finally fuck young Robbie’s tight, smooth ass over his own desk. But as much as Robbie likes getting his ass pounded, he isn’t that happy about losing out to Massimo and evens the score. Robbie proves that he can give as good as he gets and fucks Massimo until his balls are aching to shoot, and he gives us a delicious cum shower.
title: WHITE LIE: Massimo Piano and Robbie Rojo
